artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Artist: After Giacomo Cavedone
description: Virgin seated on a cloud holding child Jesus; cherubs supporting cloud; two saints kneeling at her feet; 1614 on platform on which men are kneeling
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [Giacomo Cavedone dip   F. Rosaspina dis. e incise./ B VERGINE IN GLORIA E LI SANTE PETRONIO E ALO]; in pencil on sheet: [2-257]
title: B Vergine In Gloria e li Sante Petronio e Alò
